directions: Cut each slice of ham in 3, and roll each piece on itself to form a little square.
Slide a Maille(R) cornichon, then a cube of ham, then a cube of cheese, then a tomato on a skewer. Repeat 3 times to fill the skewer.
ingredients: 1 small block of Swiss cheese, cut into cubes
title: Ham and Cheese Skewers with Crunchy Maille® Cornichons
